content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I was created, but when I received a command, an error occurred: 'NoneType' object has no attribute 'lower'. I received a web_search command to search for "Brno Reservoir trail". The search returned several results, including a 5.4-mile out-and-back trail near Brno, South Moravian, with an average completion time of 2 hours and 14 minutes. There were also options for refreshments and summer water transport stops.
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "browse_website", "args": {"url": "https://www.alltrails.com/trail/czech-republic/south-moravian/stezka-brnenska-prehrada", "question": "What information can I find about the Brno Reservoir Trail on AllTrails?"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command browse_website returned: Answer gathered from website: Error: No text to summarize\n\nLinks: []', type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "google", "args": {"query": "Brno Reservoir Trail information"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command google returned: ["https://www.alltrails.com/trail/czech-republic/south-moravian/stezka-brnenska-prehrada", "https://greatruns.com/brno-czechia-brno-reservoir-veveri-castle/", "https://hikingisgood.com/around-the-brno-reservoir/", "https://www.outdooractive.com/mobile/en/route/hiking-route/czech-republic/brno-reservoir/29020361/", "https://www.gotobrno.cz/en/place/brno-reservoir/", "https://www.south-moravia.com/en/sights/o70544-brno-reservoir", "http://experienceeurope.eu/hiking-in-brno-my-top-5/", "https://www.gotobrno.cz/en/explore-brno/go-to-brnos-dam/"]', type='action_result')]
"""
